message:
[Action Options]
1) PICK <obj>, Only PICK if gripper is empty. PICK only the correct next item according to the recipe.
2) PUT <obj1> <obj2>. <obj1> can be one of the foods. <obj2> can be food, cutting_board, or table.
3) WAIT, do nothing.
Only one robot can PUT each round. You must PICK up an item before PUT. 
[Action Output Instruction]
Think step-by-step about your plan and output your idea, and then output 'PROCEED
', give exactly one action for yourself, put on a new line, you are allowed to propose only one action for yourself!
Example#1: Dave, please PICK cheese. I will WAIT this round.
PROCEED
NAME Chad ACTION WAIT
Example#2: Alright, Chad, I will PUT cheese on the cucumber and you can PICK ham this round.
PROCEED
NAME Dave ACTION PUT cheese cucumber

[Previous Round History]
== Previous Round# ==
[Chat History]
[Chad]:
Dave, since I am holding beef_patty2, I will PUT it on cheese which is on top of tomato2 on bread_slice1. This follows the recipe order correctly. You should WAIT this round since only one robot can PUT at a time.

PROCEED
NAME Chad ACTION PUT beef_patty2 cheese
[Evaluation Score]:
The advantage score of Chad's action is 3.084!
The advantage score is high enough.
[Dave]:
Chad, your action is correct. I will WAIT this round as you PUT beef_patty2 on the cheese.

PROCEED
NAME Dave ACTION WAIT
[Evaluation Score]:
The advantage score of Dave's action is -0.989!
The score is low and the plan need to be changed!
[Dave]:
Chad, while you PUT beef_patty2 on the cheese, I will PICK ham, which is the next ingredient we need after beef_patty2 according to the recipe.

PROCEED
NAME Dave ACTION PICK ham
[Evaluation Score]:
The advantage score of Dave's action is 0.776!
The advantage score is high enough.
[Executed Action]
Chad: PUT beef_patty2 cheese
Dave: PICK ham
== Current Round ==


You are a robot Chad, collaborating with Dave to make a [big_sandwich].
Food items must be stacked following this order: bread_slice1, tomato2, cheese, beef_patty2, ham, cucumber1, bacon, beef_patty1, bread_slice2, where bread_slice1 must be PUT on cutting_board. 
You must stay on right side of the table! This means you can only PICK food from right side, and Dave can only PICK from the other side.
Only one robot can PUT at a time, so you must coordiate with Dave.

At the current round:
You can see these food items are on your reachable side:
bread_slice1: on cutting_board
cheese: atop tomato2
beef_patty1: on your side
cucumber2: on your side
beef_patty2: atop cheese
tomato2: atop bread_slice1
cucumber1: on your side
Your gripper is empty
Think step-by-step about the task and Dave's response. Carefully check and correct them if they made a mistake. 
Improve your plans if given [Environment Feedback].
Respond very concisely but informatively, and do not repeat what others have said. Discuss with others to come up with the best plan.
Each Chad or Dave's response will get an advantage score. If the score exceeds the given number, the answer will be considered as helpful to the completion of this task. 
The higher the advantage score, the greater the contribution.You can find the advantage score information in [Evaluation Score].
If [Improve Feedback] exists, please revise the plan according to the information provided by it to better complete this task!
Propose exactly one action for yourself at the **current** round, select from [Action Options].
End your response by either: 1) If everyone has made proposals and got approved, output the final plan, must strictly follow [Action Output Instruction]!


[Current Chat]
[Chad]:
Dave, since you have PICKed ham, you should now PUT ham on top of beef_patty2. I will WAIT this round because only one robot can PUT at a time.

PROCEED
NAME Chad ACTION WAIT
[Evaluation Score]:
The advantage score of Chad's action is -3.348!
The score is low and the plan need to be changed!

[Improve Feedback]
Chad's previous response:Dave, since you have PICKed ham, you should now PUT ham on top of beef_patty2. I will WAIT this round because only one robot can PUT at a time.

PROCEED
NAME Chad ACTION WAIT
The advantage score score is -3.348, it is too low to run, the answer may contain a misunderstanding of the state of the environment, you must change your action to raise the advantage score over -0.32!
You are Chad, your response is:

Dave, while you PUT ham on top of beef_patty2, I will PICK cucumber1, which is the next ingredient we need after ham according to the recipe.

PROCEED
NAME Chad ACTION PICK cucumber1

[Scores]
[Chad Response]:
Dave, since you have PICKed ham, you should now PUT ham on top of beef_patty2. I will WAIT this round because only one robot can PUT at a time.

PROCEED
NAME Chad ACTION WAIT
[Evaluation Score]:
The advantage score of Chad's action is -3.348!

[Chad Response]:
Dave, while you PUT ham on top of beef_patty2, I will PICK cucumber1, which is the next ingredient we need after ham according to the recipe.

PROCEED
NAME Chad ACTION PICK cucumber1
[Evaluation Score]:
The advantage score of Chad's action is 2.816!
